title: Border Patrol Maintains Silence After Shootings
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to the mother of a 15-year-old boy who was shot under a bridge that spans the border from El Paso, Texas, to Juarez, Mexico. (This piece aired on June 9, 2014 on Morning Edition.)
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
